programme.title: Allied troops leave Berlin in 1994
programme.short_synopsis: The final withdrawal of Allied troops from Berlin in September 1994.
programme.medium_synopsis: The Allied troop withdrawals from Berlin prompt Alistair Cooke to remember the division of Germany following the Second World War.
